mapper.select: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE company_id = #{companyId} AND deleted is NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted is NULL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (company_id, name, department, phone_number, postal_code, prefecture_code, address, mail_address, created, modified) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{name}, #{department}, #{phoneNumber}, #{postalCode}, #{prefectureCode}, #{address}, #{mailAddress}, NOW(), NOW());
mapper.delete: UPDATE companies SET deleted = NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
